document.full_text: monsoon is likely to enter india through the southern kerala coast on may 31, the weather office said on friday, marking the start of the four-month rainy season that is forecast to be normal this year, possibly boosting the farm sector.
document.title: india's 2011 monsoon rains arrival seen on time
lines_and_colors: monsoon is likely to enter india through the southern kerala coast on may 31, the weather office said on friday, marking the start of the four-month rainy season that is forecast to be normal this year, possibly boosting the farm sector.
